title: Improved polynomial decay for unbounded semigroups
authors: Chenxi Deng, Jan Rozendaal, Mark Veraar
abstract:
We obtain polynomial decay rates for $C_{0}$-semigroups, assuming that the
resolvent grows polynomially at infinity in the complex right half-plane. Our
results do not require the semigroup to be uniformly bounded, and for unbounded
semigroups we improve upon previous results by, for example, removing a
logarithmic loss on non-Hilbertian Banach spaces.
